lyrapayment-payzen.payzenDescription: This plugin enables you to setup the PayZen payment system on your Shopware website.
lyrapayment-payzen.payzenDocumentationDescription: Click to view the module configuration documentation:
lyrapayment-payzen.payzenSignAlgoDesc: Algorithm used to compute the payment form signature. Selected algorithm must be the same as one configured in the PayZen Back Office.' . The HMAC-SHA-256 algorithm should not be activated if it is not yet available in the PayZen Back Office, the feature will be available soon.
